markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vicious Evisceration](/Feats.aspx?ID=176) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 93 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy. Make a melee Strike. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the target is drained 1, or drained 2 on a critical success.
name: Vicious Evisceration
